thread.title: Relativity Television’s Employees Expected to Remain After Purchase
thread.title_full: Relativity Television’s Employees Expected to Remain After Purchase - WSJ

author: Tom Corrigan
title: Relativity Television’s Employees Expected to Remain After Purchase
text:
Relativity Television’s employees, including chief executive Tom Forman, are expected to remain in place when senior lenders buy the TV studio from the ailing company later this month, according to the lenders’ lawyers.
In court papers filed Monday with the U.S. Bankruptcy Court in Manhattan, the group of senior lenders that are buying the TV studio out of bankruptcy sought to reassure its employees, the bankruptcy judge and a handful...
